an incredibly underrated fps insanely satisfying gun play wildly good audio and one of the best toxic yet friendly communities ive ever seen nothing beats talking shit to your opponent during a match in voip to then becoming best friends with em because autobalance decided to put them on your team the following match by far best drop in drop out match based fps on the market right now and no immersion breaking slop like cod

this game is well optimized and is extremely fun i can easily pull 2545 frames a second on my intel uhd 620 no gpu laptop with low graphical settings and have a blast  the game is on the cusp of haunting realism the voice acting is very well done and the combat as well as the movement are extremely satisfying for 10 bucks this is the best shooter game ive ever played the enemy ai is also programmed well
